body_html:
Good catch for the log_softmax/logsigmoid, maybe we should deprecate one naming in favor of the other?
About CrossEntropyLoss and NLLLoss, if I remember properly it was intentional to keep CrossEntropy because CE is not as widespread as NLL. BCEWithLogitsLoss is very new and could (eventually?) be renamed.
body_text:
Good catch for the log_softmax/logsigmoid, maybe we should deprecate one naming in favor of the other?
About CrossEntropyLoss and NLLLoss, if I remember properly it was intentional to keep CrossEntropy because CE is not as widespread as NLL. BCEWithLogitsLoss is very new and could (eventually?) be renamed.
body:
Good catch for the `log_softmax`/`logsigmoid`, maybe we should deprecate one naming in favor of the other?
About `CrossEntropyLoss` and `NLLLoss`, if I remember properly it was intentional to keep `CrossEntropy` because `CE` is not as widespread as `NLL`. `BCEWithLogitsLoss` is very new and could (eventually?) be renamed.
